# Interface Filter Long List Configuration Test Fixture (REQ-2)
# Tests parsing of long filter ID lists in secure_filter_in and secure_filter_out
# Also tests dynamic filter keyword handling

# Interface with IP address
ip lan1 address 192.168.1.1/24

# Description for interface
description lan1 "LAN Interface with Security Filters"

# Inbound security filter with 13+ filter IDs
ip lan1 secure filter in 200020 200021 200022 200023 200024 200025 200103 200100 200102 200104 200101 200105 200099

# Outbound security filter with 11 static filters + dynamic keyword + 3 dynamic filters
ip lan1 secure filter out 200020 200021 200022 200023 200024 200025 200026 dynamic 200027 200028 200029

# Additional interface configurations
ip lan1 nat descriptor 1
ip lan1 proxyarp on
ip lan1 mtu 1500

# LAN2 interface with even longer filter list (15+ IDs)
ip lan2 address 192.168.2.1/24
description lan2 "Secondary LAN with Extended Filter List"

# Inbound with 15 filter IDs
ip lan2 secure filter in 300001 300002 300003 300004 300005 300006 300007 300008 300009 300010 300011 300012 300013 300014 300015

# Outbound with 12 static + 5 dynamic filters
ip lan2 secure filter out 300100 300101 300102 300103 300104 300105 300106 300107 300108 300109 300110 300111 dynamic 300200 300201 300202 300203 300204

# LAN3 interface - testing only inbound filters (20+ IDs)
ip lan3 address 192.168.3.1/24
ip lan3 secure filter in 400001 400002 400003 400004 400005 400006 400007 400008 400009 400010 400011 400012 400013 400014 400015 400016 400017 400018 400019 400020 400021 400022

# LAN4 interface - testing only outbound filters without dynamic
ip lan4 address 192.168.4.1/24
ip lan4 secure filter out 500001 500002 500003 500004 500005 500006 500007 500008 500009 500010 500011 500012 500013 500014

# Tunnel interface with long filter list
ip tunnel1 address 10.0.0.1/30
ip tunnel1 secure filter in 600001 600002 600003 600004 600005 600006 600007 600008 600009 600010 600011 600012 600013
ip tunnel1 secure filter out 600100 600101 600102 600103 600104 600105 600106 dynamic 600200 600201 600202 600203
